1.eng-name: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: Salim narrated from his father that:The Prophet forbade praying in the middle of the road, or defecating there, or urinating

chapter.ara-name: باب النَّهْىِ عَنِ الْخَلاَءِ عَلَى قَارِعَةِ الطَّرِيقِ
chapter.eng-name: Prohibition of relieving oneself in the middle of the road
